Instruction: 'Drain and rinse the canned or thawed frozen artichoke hearts.'
In a bowl, toss artichoke hearts with olive oil, garlic powder, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper until well coated.'
'Spread the artichoke hearts in a single layer on a baking sheet.'
Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until artichoke hearts are golden brown and crispy, stirring halfway through cooking.'
'Remove from oven and serve hot as a side dish or appetizer.'
